pageContext.html:
This is a collection of mostly print advertisements for the Welte-Mignon reproducing piano, encoded in TEI. Work is still in progress. The project was created as part of my PhD project "Interpretationsnetzwerke" at the University TÃ¼bingen which considers piano rolls as objects of a digital edition. It can be accessed here.

Choice of Material

The present collection includes advertisements, which:

  • appear in print publications between 1905 and 1930
  • advertise the Welte-Mignon reproducing piano
  • are published by either the company M. Welte & Sons itself or one of the licensee companies.
